## Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is the booklet for **"Generative AI"**, attempted by a mortal human being!

-   *Basics and history of the development*
-   *Related Glossary*
-   *Different Language Models*
-   *Basics of Prompt Engineering and more*
-   *More technical concepts about Gen-AI*
-   *Additional resources as extra*

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
This booklet is a collection of useful and up to date Generative AI related sources. Knowing that this is an unavailing effort but good to keep some general notes for some human beings!
:::

## Credits

the general book template is borrowed from [Hands-On Programming with R by Garrett Grolemund](https://jjallaire.github.io/hopr/) and inspired from different quarto books. All the related main sources that are considered are listed as a references at the end.
